data.message:
Hey Facebook team. I have a quick question, my friend Genelle Egidio Herbst sent me a friend, but instead accepting her request I pressed ignore by mistake. Now we are block  for sending friend requests each other, I didn't know that nowadays friend request are so sensitivity in that way. I remember that if you delete a friend request, you will be able to resend it again since I did it before. 

My question is: there is any possibility that we can be friend again and don't being block in that way. And I don't have her name in my block list 

Thanks you for helping me with this

replies.message: Hey Melissa. It might be possible that you hid your friend's request. Learn more here: http://on.fb.me/1Rzvfv7. We hope this helps. -Rey
Facebook I check the link that you sent me and followed the steps. I didn't find any friend request from my friend
